subject: BUSI
title: APPL LEARNING: SYMP CORE COMM Lecture

rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Awesome class! Really relaxed, yet engaging professor. Loves to bring media (such as funny videos) into lecture. Finds creative ways to introduce and talk about very important topics. Would take a class with him again in a heartbeat.
Amazing professor, easily the best I have had at Kenan-Flagler!!!!
